content: * everything s magical when it snows everything looks pretty the clothes are great coats scarves gloves hats lorelai gilmore / gilmore girls these gilmore girls inspired lace socks are super easy & super simple they re great for a first time toe-up knitter or a first time lace knitter and they also make the best last-minute gift with their amazingly quick-to-learn lace pattern note that the pattern is written for double-point needles but you can most definitely use circular needles if you prefer don t forget to turn on gilmore girls before you start knitting * i smell snow socks are only written for one size women s medium but the size easily modificated - let me know if you need any help with that the instructions are written for double-point needles but you can use circular needles & magic loop if you like many thanks & love to my wonderful test knitters modicum /people/modicum annesi /people/annesi and missjasminbirdie /people/missjasminbirdie i couldn t have done it without you
